articles.title: Death toll rises to 128 in Hong Kong residential fire; 8 more arrested over towers’ renovation
articles.description:
It took firefighters some 24 hours to bring the fire under control, and it was not fully extinguished until Friday morning.

The post Death toll rises to 128 in Hong Kong residential fire; 8 more arrested over towers’ renovation appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: What we do and don’t know about the shooting of 2 National Guard members in D.C.
articles.description:
Specialist Sarah Beckstrom, 20, had died from her injuries in Wednesday's shooting. Staff Sgt. Andrew Wolfe, 24, remained hospitalized in critical condition.
